com.clover.sdk.util

Class AuthTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<android.accounts.Account,java.lang.Void,CloverAuth.AuthResult>
      • com.clover.sdk.util.AuthTask

  • public class AuthTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<android.accounts.Account,java.lang.Void,CloverAuth.AuthResult>
    Authenticates with the Clover service in the background. Subclasses can override callback methods in order to respond to success or failure.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

        android.os.AsyncTask.Status

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

        SERIAL_EXECUTOR, THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR

    • Constructor Summary

      AuthTask(android.app.Activity activity)
      Create a new AuthTask.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected CloverAuth.AuthResult doInBackground(android.accounts.Account... accounts) 
      java.lang.String getErrorMessage()
      Return the error message that was generated when authentication failed, or null if authentication succeeded.
      java.lang.Exception getException()
      Return the Exception that was thrown when authentication failed, or null if authentication succeeded.
      protected void onAuthCanceled(android.accounts.OperationCanceledException e)
      Called on the main thread if OperationCanceledException was thrown during authentication.
      protected void onAuthComplete(boolean success, CloverAuth.AuthResult result)
      Called on the main thread after the auth process has completed.
      protected void onAuthenticatorException(android.accounts.AuthenticatorException e)
      Called on the main thread if AuthenticatorException was thrown during authentication.
      protected void onIOException(java.io.IOException e)
      Called on the main thread if IOException was thrown during authentication.
      protected void onPostExecute(CloverAuth.AuthResult result)
      Calls callback methods after the authentication attempt completes.

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(CloverAuth.AuthResult result)
        Calls callback methods after the authentication attempt completes. If a subclass overrides this method, it should call the parent implementation. Otherwise the callback methods will not be called.
        Overrides:
        onPostExecute in class android.os.AsyncTask<android.accounts.Account,java.lang.Void,CloverAuth.AuthResult>

      • onAuthComplete

        protected void onAuthComplete(boolean success,
                              CloverAuth.AuthResult result)
        Called on the main thread after the auth process has completed.
        Parameters:
        success - true if authentication was successful
        result - the authentication result, or null if an exception was thrown

      • onAuthCanceled

        protected void onAuthCanceled(android.accounts.OperationCanceledException e)
